title: For love of gold
creator_credit: American Mutoscope and Biograph Company and D.W. Griffith
brief_description: Based on a Jack London story about two burglars, each poisoning the other for the loot. Cast includes Harry Solter, George Gebhardt, Charles Gorman, Charles Inslee. Silent film with English intertitles.
